channel.title: Online AMA with Alex OSterwalder, author, Business Model Generation
channel.description:
We're running an AMA with Alex Osterwalder, CEO of strategyzer, author of Business Model Generation and now bootstrapped software guy.
He's discussing some of the things that came out of his talk at Business of Software on building a great company culture.
24th January at 1700 GMT **[if you want to join us here](http://businessofsoftware.org/2017/01/ama-alex-osterwalder-strategyzer-discusses-business-culture-thursday/?utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=AlexOsterwalderCulture&utm_source=Bootstrapped)**.
